Revere Beach

Nickerson

State Park

Demarest Lloyd

State Park

Popular for walking, running, and boating. Site of many events, including the 4th of July Boston Pops show and fireworks.

Family-friendly beach with calm surf and shallow, warm water. Eastern marshlands attract birdwatchers.

 

Oldest public beach in the country. Features a broad sidewalk and a popular summer sand-sculpting festival.

Fresh-water kettle ponds dot 1,900 acres of pine woodlands. Bike trail connects to the 22-mile Cape Cod Rail Trail.

Popular for walking, running, and boating. Site of many events, including the 4th of July Boston Pops show and fireworks.

Family-friendly beach with calm surf and shallow, warm water. Eastern marshlands attract birdwatchers.

 

Oldest public beach in the country. Features a broad sidewalk and a popular summer sand-sculpting festival.

Fresh-water kettle ponds dot 1,900 acres of pine woodlands. Bike trail connects to the 22-mile Cape Cod Rail Trail.
